name: df-tng
body: |- wceq(ctng, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, co(co(cv(s0), csts, cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cv(s1), cfv(csg, cv(s0))))), csts, cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cv(s1), cfv(csg, cv(s0))))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ toNrmGrp =(s0 ∈ 𝕌, s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((s0[sSet]<(dist ` ndx),(s1 ∘(-g ` s0))>)[sSet]<(TopSet ` ndx),(MetOpen `(s1 ∘(-g ` s0)))>))
comment: Define a function that fills in the topology and metric components of a structure given a group and a norm on it. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
